repast.simphony.xml

Class XMLSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • repast.simphony.xml.XMLSerializer

  • public class XMLSerializer
extends java.lang.Object
    Wraps an XStream instance and adds converters specialized for simphony.
    Author:
    Nick Collier
